# computeDeploymentAddress() function

Pre-compute a contract's deployment address for a CREATE2 deployment.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function computeDeploymentAddress(
  bytecode: string,
  encodedArgs: BytesLike,
  create2FactoryAddress: string,
): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter             | Type      | Description                                   |
| --------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| bytecode              | string    | : Creation bytecode of the contract to deploy |
| encodedArgs           | BytesLike | : Abi-encoded constructor params              |
| create2FactoryAddress | string    |                                               |

**Returns:**

string
